text.en: To the root gurus from whom I've received Dharma teachings
On the sūtras, tantras, treatises and profound pith instructions
text.en-trans: chö nam gangné zhüpé tsawa dang

text.en: As well as all the lineage gurus without exception,
I pray with a mind of constant devotion.
text.en-trans: taktu güpé yi kyi solwa deb
